title: The miser a comedy acted by His Majesties servants at the Theater Royal / written by Thomas Shadwell.
author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
The main plot is almost a translation of Molières L'Avare, but many new characters and scenes have been added. cf. "Reader," 3d prelim. leaf; Miles, Influence of Molier̀e, p. 234.
